name: Penguin GOD
text:
1 "Penguin" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Penguin" Synchro monsters
If this card is Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Penguin" monster from your hand or GY, but its effects are negated for the rest of the turn. (Quick Effect): You can negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field. You can target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand, then destroy 1 card you control. If this card is destroyed: Both players take damage equal to half of this card's original ATK. You can only use each effect of "Penguin GOD" once per turn.
